sentences.sContent: The government has agreed to underwrite the project with a grant of £5 million.
sentences.sCn: 政府同意拨款 500 万英镑资助该项目。

remMethod.val: under(在…下面)+write(写) → 在下面写上自己的名字表示同意 → 同意承担…的费用

words.tran: 保险公司；保险业者；承诺支付者；担保人

trans.tranCn: 同意负担…的费用； 通过保单承担
trans.tranOther: to support an activity, business plan etc with money, and to take financial responsibility if it fails
